snippet.title: NHL 25 Official Franchise Trailer | Deep Dive
snippet.description:
Pre-order the NHL 25 Deluxe Edition now & start playing 7 days early! http://x.ea.com/81339

Franchise Mode gets a revamp in NHL 25. Starting with the Franchise hub, streamlined navigation gives players access to new, relevant, and easy-to-digest information, like box scores, player stats, an award tracker, an updated league ticker, and a goals and challenges display. 

Plus, you can now ask players to change their playstyle, which can lead to positive or negative effects, and set player goals. In an update to Chel’s contract offer overlay and Collective Bargaining Agreement, support for No Trade and No Movement clauses is now available for each contract year, with NTC and NMC icons that make it easy to keep track of each. New conversation functions enhance negotiations, making promises, waivers, and counters a faster, more intuitive process.

Subscribe on YouTube for more NHL 25 Trailers: https://bit.ly/3kF5rTK

Follow for official news  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@easportsnhl
Instagram: https://instagram.com/easportsnhl 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/easportsnhl

#NHL25 #Franchise
